name: Mardi Winder
what_you_do: Mardi Winder-Adams is a Certified Divorce Transition & High-Conflict Divorce Coach with over 30 years of experience in mediation, conflict resolution, and coaching, helping high-achieving women navigate divorce with clarity and confidence.
social_proof: Credentialed Distinguished Mediator, international best-selling author, and speaker
signature_programs: one-on-one coaching, group programs, her podcast "The D Shift: Redefining Divorce and Beyond," and the quarterly live Real Divorce Talks
business_focus: Helping high-achieving women navigate divorce with clarity and confidence.
